title: Neil Greenberg’s New Dance ‘Betsy’ Is a Wild Child
description: White privilege, racism, two pandemics: This choreographer takes it all on with the help of “The Nutcracker” and two of dance’s go-to composers.
dc:creator: Gia Kourlas

media:content.media:credit: Mark Sommerfeld for The New York Times
media:content.media:description: The choreographer Neil Greenberg at a rehearsal of his new dance, “Betsy.” His beaded headpiece was inspired by a cast member’s flowing hair. “They’re a little like Las Vegas’s idea of a sheikh,” Greenberg said.
